The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 October is 491,428 (873.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 October, there were 74,295 new confirmed cases (132.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 September, there were 43,718 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 70% (30,577 extra cases).
